item.title: Options Page - WordPress Plugin Development - CodeTab
item.description: 6.3.Â WordPress Options Page In previous two blogs, we created a sub menu and saw how to add fields with WordPress Settings API. In this blog, as the final step, we explore WordPress Settings functions to render the WordPress Options Page. While adding the sub menu, we passed render_settings_page() method as callback function to add_submenu_page() function . The callback method has to echo the HTML required to display the page and also, use WordPress Settings API functions to output the registered fields.
